short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download a JSON file from a Netsuite Search from Saved Search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export and download your NetSuite saved search results as JSON file.

* this is an beta version, you are welcome to report issues or any bug üêû

- Description and Usage

* Install the extension, clicking on the "Add to Chrome" button 
* Now will see a new export button (yes, the blue one üòú) in your results view
* Click it and the download will be starts in a few seconds
